DOC.brief_summary: The goal study find whether high fat meal increase blood lipid cause monocyte ( white blood cell ) activation , whether blueberry intake meal lessens monocyte activation healthy people .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Antioxidants Blueberry Powder Inflammation Induced Single High Fat Meal .
DOC.detailed_description: This study design single blind , placebo-controlled crossover study . Subjects never tell dose blueberry powder give . Researchers handle sample data know dose blueberry powder subject receive test day 2 3 . The frozen blueberry yogurt supplement either control blueberry powder cod letter , sample cod test day : since control powder give first day subject , laboratory staff analyze sample would know first day sample subject receive control powder.The provision control powder first day subject do mitigate potential carry effect blueberry powder.The randomization plan two dos ( two vs four serving ) blueberry powder uploaded spreadsheet register dietitian , Human Studies Manager , Metabolic Kitchen Human Feeding Laboratory staff access . Subjects instruct registered dietitian follow low polyphenol omega-3 diet limit consumption fruit , vegetable , soy , fatty fish ( e.g . salmon ) , whole grain , nut , coffee , tea , chocolate start 3 day prior test day . The night test day , subject require eat standardized dinner provide WHNRC . Since previous meal may impact postprandial response next , subject fed dinner consist burrito tortilla , chicken , cheese , oil , pinto bean well yogurt lemonade . On test day , subject arrive WHNRC 12-hour overnight fast . Subjects body temperature , blood pressure , weight measure , blood withdrawn . Subjects fed MHF breakfast supplement frozen yogurt contain either control blueberry powder . Subjects give 20 minute consume entire breakfast . Subjects instruct eat drink anything plain water . Three one-half hour follow consumption test meal subject return WHNRC postprandial blood draw . Postprandial hypertriglyceridemia peak average 3.5 hour consumption high fat breakfast , thus 3.5 hour blood draw provide high concentration TGRL . Subjects allowed return normal activity morning meal postprandial blood draw . Following postprandial blood draw , subject allow return normal dietary habit three day prior next test day . Subjects feed control powder first test day . On second third test day subject fed vary amount blueberry powder equivalent two four serving fresh blueberry ( 24.1 g 48.2 g blueberry powder , respectively ) random order .
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult Able complete study procedure Body Mass Index 18 24.9 kg/m2 Diabetes mellitus Kidney disease Liver disease Thyroid disease Bleeding disorder Autoimmune diseases inflammatory disease Cancer , unless remission > 5 year Blood cell count outside normal range age gender Blood chemistry panel outside normal range age gender Blood cholesterol great 240 mg/dL Blood triacylglycerol great 300 mg/dL Hemoglobin le 11.5 g/dL Hypertension , blood pressure great 140/90 mmHg Follow vegetarian diet Smoke use tobacco product Drink one alcoholic beverage per day Taking cholesterollowering blood pressure medication Daily regular use antihistamine Use nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAIDs ) Use steroid asthma inflammatory disease Use thyroidregulating drug Use counter weight loss product Known allergy sensitivity food ingredient test meal Taking fish algal oil supplement unwilling stop Pregnant lactating woman
